fulltext:
HUYNH THI BACH DIEP 
¨ October 18th, 1987 ¨ Female ¨ Single 
¨ 097 979 2537 ¨ bachdiep.huynh@gmail.com ¨ bachdiep.huynh (skype) 
¨ http://vn.linkedin.com/in/taviahuynh/ 
¨ https://vn.linkedin.com/in/diephuynh/  
¨ 393 Le Quang Sung St., Ward 9, Dist. 6, HCMC 
CAREER OBJECTIVE 
I would like to strengthen and widen my knowledge in not only recruitment but also some other 
fields of Human Resource Management such as Employee Relations or Organization Development, 
Training, Rewards, Compensation and Benefits, etc. 
¨ Passion in HR  
¨ Self-motivated  
¨ Well-organized  
¨ Hard-working 
¨ High responsible  
¨ Independent work 
¨Team work 
¨ High pressure 
¨ Result oriented 
¨ Flexible and adaptable 
CAREER SUMMARY 
May 2015 – Dec 2018 
S3 CORPORATION (Former Sunrise Software Solutions Corp.) 
Senior Recruitment & Training Executive _ Team Leader role 
Jul. 2014 – May 2015 
GIANTY CO., LTD (Former GNT Vietnam) 
HR Executive 
Apr. 2012 – Jul. 2014 
GLOBAL NETWORK TECHNOLOGIES CO., LTD (GNT Vietnam) 
HR Executive 
Apr. 2010 – Jan.2012 
GREYFINDERS CO., LTD 
ESS Consultant 
January – March, 2010 
VIETSOURCING JOINT STOCK COMPANY 
HR Assistant 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE ( 8 years experience ) 
May 2015 – Dec. 2018 
S3 CORPORATION – Former Sunrise Software Solutions Corp. 
IT Outsourcing Company (www.s3corp.com.vn)  
Senior Recruitment & Training Executive  
(Acting as Team Leader) 
Responsibilities: 
* Recruitment: 
- 
Acting as Recruitment & Training Team Leader, managing 2 members and directly 
work with CEO, Hiring Managers. 
- 
Representing for recruitment team working with delivery team on recruitment 
activities. 
- 
Closely working with Hiring Team to update the lasted information about 
project/candidates/requests, quickly discuss and solve problems during hiring 
process. 
- 
Being responsible for recruitment needs in terms of quantity, quality and timing. 
- 
Applying and improving recruitment process and policy continuously. 
- 
Building & maintaining good relationship with candidates as well as line managers. 
- 
Working with Line manager to identify requirements of each vacancy. 
- 
Developing networks and channels for Employers branding. 
- 
Arranging interview meetings for candidates & line managers. 
- 
Conducting final interview meetings under HR roles. 
- 
Informing rejected or unsuitable candidates, verbally or by letter. 
- 
Checking reference (if any). 
- 
Dealing, making & sending Offer Letter to successful candidates. 
- 
Revising Recruitment process and guidelines. 
- 
Composing Recruitment Templates: Recruitment Process, Newcomers Introduction, 
email templates using in recruitment activities, etc. 
- 
Directly working with suppliers/partners on related activities: Headhunters, 
Recruitment Sites, Universities, etc. 
- 
Reporting weekly and monthly to CEO and Board of Directors. 
Achievements: 
Familiar with technical terms, explore new technical according to IT markets 
Filled in vacancies in charged at almost all levels:  
- 
Development Team: Fullstack Javascript, Android, iOS, Java, .Net, MacOS, C++, PHP, 
Python, Ruby on Rails, etc.  
- 
Testing Team: QC for Web, QC for Mobile Apps, QC for Network, Telecom, etc. 
- 
Back Office: Accountant, HR, Graphic Designer, Marketing, Business Development, 
IT, System Administrator, etc. 
* Employer Branding & Employee Engagement: 
- 
Running Internal Referral / Joining Bonus programs 
- 
Working with Marketing team on Job Postings on social media: design posters, job 
ads, run ads on Internal Channels, Facebook Fanpage, Linkedin. 
- 
Working with Marketing team to organize and join careers job fair (if any). 
- 
Supporting HR General Team on organizing company activities: Company Trip, Year 
end Party, etc. 
* Training: 
- 
Coordinating and providing information to managers or staffs about training policy. 
- 
Receiving training needs from managers, identify and collect feedback from many 
other sources to check if it meets training needs or not. 
- 
Making quotation for training courses. 
- 
Building and maintaining relationship with Training agencies / Trainers. 
- 
Keeping track and checking training reimbursement (if any). 
- 
Self-organizing annual English TOEIC Test for whole company. 
- 
Revising Training policy and guidelines. 
- 
Building English Test policy and guidelines. 
Achievements: 
Well-organized training documents. 
Successfully organized and managed internal training classes (technical, softskill, foreign 
languages, etc.) 
Successfully organized Annual English TOEIC Test with very minor supervision.  
Jul. 2014 – May 2015 
GIANTY CO., LTD (former GNT Vietnam) 
Game Studio, and Smartphone Application – www.gianty.com.vn  
Human Resources Executive 
(Focusing on Recruitment and Employee Relations) 
Responsibilities: 
* Recruitment: 
- 
Being responsible for recruitment needs in terms of quantity, quality and timing. 
- 
Building & maintaining good relationship with candidates as well as line managers. 
- 
Working with Line manager to identify requirements of each vacancy. 
- 
Developing networks and channels for Employers branding. 
- 
Arranging interview meetings for candidates & line managers. 
- 
Conducting final interview meetings under HR roles. 
- 
Informing rejected or unsuitable candidates, verbally or by letter. 
- 
Checking reference (if any). 
- 
Reporting weekly and monthly to Manager. 
Achievements: 
Meeting target & deadlines for vacancies in charged: PHP Team Leader/Developer, C++ 
Developer, Android Developer, iOS Developer, Front-end Developer, HTML Slicer/Developer, 
Game Operator (English Native Speaker), QC Engineer, Tester, Monitor, and Graphic 
Designer etc. 
* Employee Relations 
- 
Organizing Happy Hour Party for company (Small party at every Friday evening) 
- 
Organizing Christmas Party 2012, 2013 and 2014 for whole company 
- 
Organizing Year-End Party 2012, 2013 and 2014 for company  
- 
Organizing Annual Football Champion  
- 
Organizing Company Trip 2013 and 2014 
- 
Organizing Happy Women’s Day, Children Day, etc. 
Achievements: 
Well organized and on time party 
Apr. 2012 – Jul. 2014 
GLOBAL NETWORK TECHNOLOGIES CO., LTD (GNT VIETNAM) 
Social Network, Game Studio, Smartphone Apps & E-commerce 
Human Resources Executive  
(Focusing on Recruitment and Employee Relations) 
Responsibilities: 
- 
The same as above at Gianty Co., Ltd 
Apr. 2010 – Jan.2012 
GREYFINDERS CO., LTD 
Human Resource Service Company – www.greyfinders.com  
Executive Search & Selection Consultant 
Responsibilities: 
- 
Searching and recruiting potential candidates according to clients’ requirements 
- 
Approaching and building relationship with new potential clients. 
- 
Testing candidates’ language skills. 
- 
Arranging meetings and appointments for candidates and clients. 
- 
Expanding and updating the candidates’ database. 
- 
Interviewing candidates, making reports and submitting to clients. 
- 
Keeping clients and candidates informed on progress. 
- 
Informing rejected or unsuitable candidates, verbally or by letter 
- 
Creating and maintaining good relationships with both clients and candidates 
- 
Making reference check (if any) 
- 
Reporting to Executive Search Manager every month 
- 
Supporting ESS Manager in searching candidates for clients 
Achievements: 
Searching and Selecting right candidates for our clients: GlaxoSmithKline (GSK), Hoang Duc 
Pharma, Pepsi, Masan, Vinamilk, Akzo Nobel, Philips Morris, etc. 
Having successful candidates for :  
GSK 
Controls Assurance & Special Projects Manager 
(Equivalent Finance Director) 
Finance Assistant 
Finance Business Partner Assistant 
Event Specialist 
Hoang Duc Pharma 
Financial Controller 
Distribution & Warehouse Manager 
Pepsi  
Senior Consumer Insight Executive (equivalent Manager level) 
Corporate Communication Executive 
Internal Auditor 
Gannon 
Area Sales Supervisor 
Akzo Nobel 
Assistant to General Director 
VNG (Vinagame former) 
Internal Auditor 
PetroSetco Distribution 
General Accountant 
Connel Brothers 
Sales Executive (Water Treatment Chemicals) 
January – March, 2010 
VIETSOURCING JOINT STOCK COMPANY 
Professional service provider: training, accounting & auditing, HR 
Recruitment Assistant 
Responsibilities: 
- 
Developing HR service, concentrating on Recruitment process. 
- 
Carrying out Recruitment process for internal as well as clients. 
- 
Expanding candidates’ database: telephone, direct, email, forums... 
- 
Making relationship between departments and staffs. 
- 
Posting jobs on websites. 
- 
Searching, screening, evaluating potential candidates for each job vacancies. 
- 
Arranging appointment for selected candidates for test and interview. 
- 
Interviewing candidates for junior position. 
- 
Maintaining relationships with potential clients. 
- 
Developing and promoting website: http://www.vnjobseek.com 
- 
Updating data on CRM (VTiger). 
- 
Doing other tasks assigned by Manager. 
Achievements: 
Assisting HR Team Leader filling 10 internal vacancies and meeting deadline. 
April – August, 2009 
SHANE ENGLISH CENTER 
Program Advisor cum Administrator  
Responsibilities: 
- 
Consulting and helping students choose the right courses. 
- 
Preparing class' file for each classes. 
- 
Conduct telephone teaching on time. 
- 
Planning and preparing test. 
- 
Reporting progress of each class monthly. 
- 
Making Reminding fee letter every week. 
- 
Doing some other tasks assigned by Manager 
EDUCATION 
2005 – 2009 
: Ho Chi Minh City University of Foreign Languages –  
  Information Technology (HUFLIT University) 
  Bachelor of Art - Office Administration in English 
  Grade: Credit 
Aug. – Oct., 2008 
: Human Resource Development Institution 
  Certificate of Completion of Human Resource Manager 
  Grade: Distinction 
2007 – 2008 
: Faculty of Economics – Vietnam National University HCMC 
  Certificate of Completion of Secretary and Assistant Director 
  Grade: Distinction 
RESEARCH 
Mar. – Aug., 2009: 
- 
Graduation Paper: “Analyzing the training and developing employees of ACE Life 
Insurance Limited Company and some suggestions” 
Oct, 2008 – Jan., 2009:  
- 
Final Essay: “Analyzing the Department of International Relations’ corporate culture 
of HUFLIT University” 
- 
Press Conference: “Introducing the New Public Relations Program of Department of 
International Relations of HUFLIT University” 
SKILL 
Searching and screening candidates’ CV skills. 
Time management and arrangement skills. 
Negotiation skill. 
Interviewing skill. 
Telephoning skill. 
Proficient user of MS Word, MS Excel, MS Power Point, Email and Internet. 
Well-organized, high responsible. 
- 
- 
- 
- 
- 
- 
- 
INTEREST AND ACTIVITY 
Working in Human Resource field. 
Listening to music (English songs), surfing internet, hanging out with friends… 
Participating in social activities; especially, charity activities. 
2007 – 2008: Taking part in Blood Donation Day four times. 
May, 2009: Join in volunteer group to sell souvenirs to make charity funds in order 
to help three poor families at Binh Duong Province. 
2008: Take part in teaching Street Children at Ánh Sáng House at District 10, HCMC. 
- 
- 
- 
- 
-
